mmcontext.pp.CategoryEmbedder#

class mmcontext.pp.CategoryEmbedder(metadata_categories, embeddings_file_path, model='text-embedding-ada-002', combination_method='concatenate', one_hot=False, unknown_threshold=20, logger=None)#

Embed metadata categories using OpenAI’s text embedding model.

ContextEmbedder Subclass that looks at the individual metadata categories and generates embeddings for each unique value. If multiple classes are chosen, the embeddings are combined using the specified method.

Args:

metadata_categories (list): List of metadata categories to process. embeddings_file_path (str): Path to the dictionary to save/load embeddings. model (str): Text embedding model to use. combination_method (str): Method to combine embeddings (‘average’, ‘concatenate’). one_hot (bool): Whether to use one-hot encoding for metadata categories. unkown_threshold (int): Threshold for unknown elements when API key is not available but most classes were known from dictionary. If less than the threshold, unkonwn elements will be filled with zeros.

Raises:

  • ValueError – If a metadata category is missing from adata.obs.:

  • ValueError – If no API key is set and unknown elements are greater than threshold.:

Methods table#

combine_metadata_embeddings(adata)

Combines embeddings from specified metadata categories.

embed(adata)

Generates or updates embeddings for the AnnData object and combines them.

generate_text_embedding(text)

Generates an embedding for the given text using OpenAI's embedding model.

generate_update_metadata_embeddings(...)

Generates or updates embeddings for metadata categories.

load_metadata_embeddings()

Loads the metadata embeddings from a compressed file.

process_adata_metadata_embeddings(adata)

Processes and updates metadata embeddings for the AnnData object.

save_metadata_embeddings()

Saves the metadata embeddings to a compressed file.

Methods#

CategoryEmbedder.combine_metadata_embeddings(adata)#

Combines embeddings from specified metadata categories.

Args:

adata (anndata.AnnData): The AnnData object containing the data.

Returns:

np.ndarray: Combined embeddings.

CategoryEmbedder.embed(adata)#

Generates or updates embeddings for the AnnData object and combines them.

Args:

adata (anndata.AnnData): The AnnData object containing the data.

Returns:

np.ndarray: Combined context embeddings.

CategoryEmbedder.generate_text_embedding(text)#

Generates an embedding for the given text using OpenAI’s embedding model.

Args:

text (str): The text for which to generate an embedding.

Returns:

list: A list representing the embedding vector, or None in case of failure.

CategoryEmbedder.generate_update_metadata_embeddings(unique_categories)#

Generates or updates embeddings for metadata categories.

Args:

unique_categories (dict): Dictionary with categories as keys and list of unique values.

CategoryEmbedder.load_metadata_embeddings()#

Loads the metadata embeddings from a compressed file.

Returns:

dict: The embeddings dictionary.

CategoryEmbedder.process_adata_metadata_embeddings(adata)#

Processes and updates metadata embeddings for the AnnData object.

Args:

adata (anndata.AnnData): The AnnData object containing the data.

CategoryEmbedder.save_metadata_embeddings()#

Saves the metadata embeddings to a compressed file.
